string.text: What happened? Is he dead? Turn back immediately!!!
What happened? Is he dead? Take neasurements and turn back immediately!!! \n
To shut down a magic plant, press ($$ACTION_USE$$)
Well done, Branded One, you did reached the laboratory. It's very important for us to study this plant \nin the laboratory. Try to cut it off, in order we would be able research it.

Excellent work, Branded One. A radiation is off, you're alive. I want to warn you, we've sent the pair of \nmilitary helicopters to clean out territory from zombie, therefore it's better not to go there for a while \nin order not to get under a fire. Yeeh, by the way, if you'll pass by, drop in a bunker to us.
